data_table.description: Menstrual History Questionnaire, Offspring Cohort 1996 - 2001. This questionnaire was administered to all female participants who attended the baseline Ex6/7 Osteoporosis study, which is a "callback" from Offspring Exam 6.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: m6_7q2a
variable.description: If your periods were regular, at about age 25, about how many days on average were there between the first day of one period and the first day of your next period?
variable.comment: This question does not include times when breastfeeding or pregnant. If pregnant at age 25, tell us about your periods at ages 26 or 27.

variable.name: m6_7q2b
variable.description: If your periods were irregular, on average, about how many periods did you have per year when you were about age 25?
variable.comment: This question does not include times when breastfeeding or pregnant. If pregnant at age 25, tell us about your periods at ages 26 or 27.
